# Interface TransformationStreamOptions<IT, OT>

Configuration options for creating a transformation stream.

interface TransformationStreamOptions<IT, OT> {  
outputType: [TransformationStreamType](/enums/common_stream_interfaces.TransformationStreamType);  
stream: any;  
transform: (input: IT) => OT | Promise<OT>;  
}

#### Type Parameters

  * IT
  * OT



##### Index

### Properties

outputType stream transform

## Properties

### outputType

outputType: [TransformationStreamType](/enums/common_stream_interfaces.TransformationStreamType)

The type of transformation stream to create.

### stream

stream: any

External reference to the stream.

### transform

transform: (input: IT) => OT | Promise<OT>

Transform function that processes input to output.

Member Visibility

  * Inherited
